Key Match Events: Qatar's Moustafa Mashal scored in the fourth minute.
Almoez Ali doubled Qatar's lead in the 47th minute.
Yousuf Abdurisag secured Qatar's 3-0 win in the 84th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: India's next opponents will be Afghanistan in their third group game on March 21, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's 15-game unbeaten home run came to an end.
Amrinder gave away the ball twice, leading to critical moments for Qatar.
